summary: This bill, the Stephanie Tubbs Jones Uterine Fibroid Research and Education Act of 2025, addresses uterine fibroids. It mandates the Secretary of Health and Human Services to expand, intensify, and coordinate research on uterine fibroids, including research into Medicaid and CHIP coverage for treatments. The bill also establishes a public education program to raise awareness, particularly among minority groups, about fibroids, their treatment options, and disseminates information to healthcare providers. Funding is authorized for research and education initiatives.
